Package org.sercho.masp.space.event

Defines the EventedTupleSpace which sends events about occurrences in the space.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
EventedTupleSpace<T> EventedTupleSpace
SpaceObserver<T> SpaceObserver
 

Class Summary
EventedSpaceWrapper<T> AdvancedEventedSpaceWrapper add eventing functionality to a given TupleSpace.
EventedSpaceWrapper.SpaceDestroyer<T> SpaceDestroyer holds a space which he is able to destroy.
EventedSpaceWrapper.SpaceIterator<T> SpaceIterator TODO comment
RemoveAllCallEvent<E> RemoveAllCallEvent is sent, when TupleSpace.removeAll(Object) has been called.
RemoveCallEvent<E> RemoveCallEvent
SpaceEvent<E> SpaceEvent describes all events that occur in a TupleSpace.
SpaceObserverAdapter<T> SpaceObserverAdapter is an abstract adapter class for receiving space events.
UpdateCallEvent<E> UpdateCallEvent is fired when the TupleSpace.update(Object, Object) has been called.
WriteCallEvent<E> WriteCallEvent informs about a new object in a space
 

Package org.sercho.masp.space.event Description

Defines the EventedTupleSpace which sends events about occurrences in the space.
